titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2,5-bis[(1,3-dioxobutyl)amino]benzenesulfonic acid.
To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2,5-bis[(1,3-dioxobutyl)amino]benzenesulfonic acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2,5-bis[(1,3-dioxobutyl)amino]benzenesulfonic acid.
